page.title: 09Personality 2 (Middle Age)
page.content: Peter Leith is a farmer in his mid 50's.He and his forebears have worked the farm of Appiehouse for generations He owns about 16 hectares (14 acres)of arable land which by today's standards is small.To supplement his income he works part time at a dairy farm in the parish. He is also registrar for the parish which means that he records the births, deaths and marriages.On the farm he specialises in beef cattle and his wife helps him.He has one married daughter who lives in Orkney, one married daughter who lives on the Scottish mainland and a son who lives in Orkney and specialises in computers.He does not know whether his son will take over the farm.Peter gets up in the morning at 6.45 and rarely has a holiday. He attends church regularly and his favourite hobby is reading.
